wikipedia_page.main: John Howe 4th Baron Chedworth (1754–1804) was a reclusive English aristocrat.

response: * John Howe, 4th Baron Chedworth (1754–1804), last Baron Chedworth
The family seat was Stowell Park, Gloucestershire, and he was succeeded in the barony by his nephew John Howe, 4th Baron Chedworth.
